page.name: Optional readings
page.intro: Additional articles on lesson planning and backwards design.
page.content:
Check out these additional articles and video on lesson planning and backward design if you are interested, or save them for later. We have included them here just FYI.

Backward Design - What is it? View the video below. this video

Lesson Planning resource from www.teachingforsuccess.com, a community college faculty development center.

Writing Standards-based Lessons, Planning for Improved Student Achievement resource from High Schools that Work, an effort of the Southern Regional Education Board.
